entities.name: scrimgeour
entities.description: Scrimgeour is introduced as someone who is cutting in and speaking to the Prime Minister about security.

entities.name: muggles
entities.description: Muggles are mentioned as a group that would be affected if their Prime Minister gets put under the Imperius Curse.

entities.name: kingsley shacklebolt
entities.description: Kingsley Shacklebolt is introduced as the new secretary in the Prime Minister's outer office and is described as highly efficient.

entities.name: prime minister
entities.description: The Prime Minister is mentioned as someone who has already got security but Scrimgeour suggests that it might not be enough.

relationships.description: Scrimgeour has concerns about the Prime Minister's security and suggests that it might not be enough.
Kingsley Shacklebolt is assigned to work for the Prime Minister's protection.
